gwt.g3d.client.shader
Class LambertianShader

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g3d.client.shader.AbstractShader
      gwt.g3d.client.shader.BasicShader3D
          gwt.g3d.client.shader.LambertianShader
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLDisposable, Shader
public class LambertianShader
extends BasicShader3D

Represents a per-pixel lambertian shader. This shader inherits all of BasicShader3D variables. In additions, it also contains the following variables: uniform vec3 uLightPosition; uniform vec4 uDiffuseColor;

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com
